message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Alice, $18,000 is way out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,000.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down to $15,000, but that's still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $12,000. It's my final offer.
